questions.question: What is the predominant color of the liquid inside the glass container?
What is the primary material composing the main body of the container?
What is the overall shape of the container, disregarding the handle?
Describe the primary texture of the visible glass surface.
What is the color of the cap or lid sealing the top of the container?
What type of closure mechanism is attached to the top of the container?
What is the apparent overall volume capacity of the container?

What is the general shape of the bottle's base?
What can be observed on the lower section of the bottle?
What is the general color scheme of the visible label?
Is the visible liquid exhibiting any significant clarity or cloudiness?
Does the glass container show any visible imperfections or damage?
